snippet: The pension fund was ranked a "laggard" in transparency and managing climate risks in a report released by the Asset Owners Disclosure Project,
lead_paragraph: The pension fund was ranked a "laggard" in transparency and managing climate risks in a report released by the Asset Owners Disclosure Project,

headline.main: World Bank's Pension Holdings Clash With Its Carbon Policies
headline.print_headline: World Bank's Pension Holdings Clash With Its Carbon Policies
